channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Data Loss on Wikipedia 10 Common Causes of Data Loss from Consolidated Technologies Backup Types Explained: Full, Incremental, Differential, Synthetic, and Forever-Incremental from Nakivo Understanding RPO and RTO from Druva What is High Availability? from DigitalOcean Law Firm Retools its Backup Scenario from Network World Postmortem of Database Outage of January 31 from GitLab Video Transcript Backups are an important part of any system administratorâ€™s toolkit.
